machine_width.label: Machine Width
machine_width.description: The width (X-direction) of the printable area.

machine_depth.label: Machine Depth
machine_depth.description: The depth (Y-direction) of the printable area.

machine_shape.label: Build Plate Shape
machine_shape.description: The shape of the build plate without taking unprintable areas into account.

machine_height.label: Machine Height
machine_height.description: The height (Z-direction) of the printable area.

machine_heated_bed.label: Has Heated Build Plate
machine_heated_bed.description: Whether the machine has a heated build plate present.

material_diameter.label: Diameter
material_diameter.description: Adjusts the diameter of the filament used. Match this value with the diameter of the used filament.

machine_start_gcode.label: Start G-code
machine_start_gcode.description: G-code commands to be executed at the very start - separated by \n.
machine_start_gcode.default_value:
G28 ;Home
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 X10.1 Y20 Z0.28 F5000 ;Move to start
G1 X10.1 Y100 Z0.28 F1500 E15 ;Draw first line
G1 X10.4 Y100 Z0.28 F5000.0 ;Move over a bit
G1 X10.4 Y20 Z20.28 F1500.0 E30 ;Draw second line
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 Z15 ;Lower Z 15mm
G1 X110 Y110 ;Move to center to start print

machine_end_gcode.label: End G-code
machine_end_gcode.description: G-code commands to be executed at the very end - separated by \n.
machine_end_gcode.default_value:
M104 S0
;Turn off Extruder
M140 S0
;Turn off Bed
;Turn off Fan
M106 S0
;Move nozzle away while extracting
G91
G1 X-2 Y-2 E-3 F300
;Lower Bed 10mm
G1 Z10 F3000
; Move print head out of the way and bed down
G90
G0 X180 Y180
G0 Z200
